title: Identifying a hash function knowing both input and output
content:
I am creating a custom client for an old game. Now I got stuck on login to the server. I made several experiments with wireshark but it doesn't seem to be any common hashes.
From my limited understanding, it doesn't seem to be salted because the same input gets the same output even if I change my account, device, ip...
Here are some inputs and outputs:
00000 - 5a5ef2
000000 - 9a5af4
0000000 - daacf7
11111 - 763443
01010 - 0660bf
22222 - 82eff1
123123123123 - 368188
password - 8606df
☺☺☺☺☺ - e27952
